subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jarrod Saltalamacchia, who was mentored by Jason Varitek and has the most home runs among catchers in the majors, doesn’t take himself too seriously playing for the Red Sox.
snippet: Jarrod Saltalamacchia, who was mentored by Jason Varitek and has the most home runs among catchers in the majors, doesn’t take himself too seriously playing for the Red Sox.
